entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story who is described as having fangs and biting the man. (Excerpt: 'Harry longed to bite the man . . . but he must master the impulse.')

entities.name: the man
entities.description: A person who is being bitten by Harry. (Excerpt: 'He reared high from the floor and struck once, twice, three times, plunging his fangs deeply into the man’s flesh...')

entities.name: the snake
entities.description: A snake that is mentioned in the title of the story. (Excerpt: 'THE  EYE  OF  THE  SNAKE')

relationships.description: Harry bites the man, causing him pain. (Excerpt: 'He reared high from the floor and struck once, twice, three times, plunging his fangs deeply into the man’s flesh...')
